Blog.post: here's a lyric dat i wanna share..but its a mly lyrics ar..:S anyting lah ehk..basicly..its a revenge song..:D:D:D Pulangkan

urlLink Claz Grad Nyte MagaZine urlLink wow! its been quite sumtym since i post sumting 4 ma bloggy..:S:P well.. its not dat i dun wanna update it..its juz dat im not 'gd' in d bloggy tingy..~ i will make it more nicer once i knew da 'selok belok nye' k ;P btw..2day..had quite a gd tym at Miera's place..2gether wif CT n Patrick...da 4 of us hang ard at Miera's house 2 do a grad nyte pg magazine of our claz..we spent da whole afternoon doin diz..n da pg above is produced!!:D:P nice ryte!!?? haha!! i lyk it..!!:D:P thanx 2 Miera,4 her camera..CT,4 her programme in editing da pictures..Patrick,4 his ideas..n ME,4 giving views!! haha!! but..we're satisfied wif wat we've done as we had spent our tym doin diz 2 pg of da claz grad nyte magazine..if we depend on othas..i dun tink it'll b done..:S not no confidence in dem ar..but..i dunnoe ar..~ i juz feel dat it wont b done.. :S:x wateva it is..~ i hope dat our pg will b da best among da graduation clazes..:P haha!! yeah..!! i guez diz is all i haf 2 crap abt..haha!!:P im a bit mabok after returning frm Miera's house!!!:S:x i dunnoe y..~ :S haha!! kiez !!! signing off!! *chow*
but wateva it is...i wun regret if losing such frenz..coz i still haf ma lurve ones by ma side..my mum..ma guy...n ma belurved TRUE frenz!! :):) MUAH!!!

hey allz! im juz finding sumting to do..im damn bored 2day...n i dunnoe y im not in a stable mood recently..=S haiz..:x well...i actually lyk ma sec sch lyf..only dat der r sumtings dat makes it sux..above all..ive met a few frenz dat really appreciated me n accepted me 4 who i m..2 whom i share ma ups n downs wif..always der 2 advice me,perhapz gimmie a shoulder to cry..:P haha!! :p i feel verie fortunate 2 haf dis few frenz ive met..n i thank dem 4 all d advices,encouragement...dey can bear wif ma stubborn-nez at certain areas... thankiew berie much...i cant afford 2 lose dem...:S haiz.... but it doesnt mean dat im dun appreciate d other frenz dat ive bfen wif..i do..i even der in their ups & help their downz...especially diz yr..coz its a combination of da 2-normal-academic clazes 2gether..so get to bfren more crazie outgoing wacky bunch of frenz.. n oso diz is da final yr in HkSs..so i tot of makin it a memorable yr 4 me n perhaps 2 ma clazmatez as well..its kinda of a hope ar..but dat hope has flow down da drain.....i didnt expect it 2 turn out diz way..... everyting wen on smoothly at da beginnin of da yr...i had a gd tym wif ma clazmatez..all da jokes n lafter...we shared quite a great tym 2gether..n at tyms,wen dey are down...i gaf dem a listening ear..dat's if dey trusted me & feel comfortable talking 2 me...some did share dem wif me...i gif dem advices...at tyms i gif dem ma shoulder 2 cry on..i comfort dem...b wif dem during their downs.. den...all of a sudden..it changed...all gone 'hay-wire'(if im not mistaken da spellin)... dey ignored me after all doz effort ive spent on dem!! OMG!! i dunnoe wat ive done wrong...n i dun undastan y da FUCK dey did diz 2 me...but ders sumting dat struck ma mind in which all diz happened....ENVY...JealOUsy... but is diz true?? i haf not idea... ...After all dat ive done 4 dem..n is diz wat i get in return??? i feel UN-APPRECIATED n ive WASTED ma PRECIOUS tym 4 dem...im not saying dat im not SINCERE in helping dem..im sincere...but i feel sad...juz sad...4 their attitude of being un-AppRecIated...im sad...terribly sad....ma hart break lyk a shattered glaz.... i dun undastan of y i shud im given da appreciation diz way... btw im not a bastard eh!!i dun bastard peepz...but most of da tym..peeps bastard me..or even BACKSTAB me ~...haiz... ive had enuf of diz..so ive decided...4 dat UN-APPRECIATED shytz...dun bother 2 cum 2 luk 4 me wen u're down , up , upsyd down.. wateva..i wun entertain..ive had enuf..if u were in ma shoes..how wud u feel?? haiz...i dun undastan human nowadayz...but wateva it is...take ...take all dat u want...i cant b bothered 2 say or do anyting..u guyz are grown-ups n haf MATURED tinking to tink wat da hell is Ryte & Wrong...haiz.. Remember...Up or Down..dun cum luking 4 me..FucK oFF!! wun b entertain tru msn,face2face,calls etc etc..i dun wan 2 b treated dat particular way tym & again... .....i treasure every swit memories da claz had 2gether & da sad ting is dat i cud neva turn back da tym to get it all back & continue diz un4getable memories as b4...& treasured verie much da frenship dat i had wif ma couple of true frenz who are still wif me till now & a few otha frenzie.......hopefullie dey are still der 4 me...if dey happen 2 end up lyk dem...haiz.....ma hart will b lost...not break/shattered.. but disappear n neva b found... :( *accePt me 4 da WAy i Am..wHo I am..AppRecIate & feel ForTUnatE as ders Sum1 wHo is Der Tym &amp; EffOrt 4 ya.. Not AcCept me 4 WAT I AM & trustin WERDS rather den KnOwin DA REAL FUCKING TRUTH*

hi!! wow! shockingly..i've created myself a bloggy !! :P haha!!well i'll b posting some crappy stuff soon!! so watch out k :P :P :D ;) well..as diz is ma 1st posting...i wont type so long...coz..i dunnoe wat 2 type!! :P haha!! so enjoy reading n do post comments :D ;) thanky ;)
